title: Back-End Developer (Python, Java)
company_name: Công Ty TNHH LG CNS VIỆT NAM
job_description:
Design, develop, and optimize backend services
Python-based AI service SM work and additional function development work
Build and deploy RESTful APIs to support integration with other systems
Design, develop, and optimize backend services.
requirements:
[Required]
Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or related fields.
At least 3 years of experience in backend development.
Proficiency in Python and/or Java.
Database management systems such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, or Redis.
Experience with cloud services (AWS, Azure, or GCP) is a plus.
Familiarity with CI/CD tools, Docker, Kubernetes is an advantage.
Excellent teamwork, communication, and time management skills.
Ability to read and understand technical documents in English.
[Preferred]
Understanding Public Cloud (AWS, Azure, GCP, etc.) Terminology
Work experience in the development of AI areas
AWS / GCP / Azure Cloud SDK Programming
